Translations.Text: geudeul-ui hyeongje noaga geudeul-ege malhaessdeola hananim-eul dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
sillo naega neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
naneun neohuiege geue daehan bosang-eul yoguhaji anihamae sillo naui bosang-eun man-yuui junimkkeseo ju sinila
geuleona hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
geudeul-i daedabhagil gajang mi cheonhan jadeul-i ttaleugo issneun neoleul mid eulan mal-inyo
geuga malhagil geudeul-i haengha go issneun geos-i mueos-inji aneunba eobs doda
geudeul-ui gyesan-eun danji junimkkeiss-eum-eul neohuineun algo iss-eulila
ittae geudeul-i malhagil noayeonega man-il dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon neo neun dol-e maj-a jugge doelila
geuga malhagil juyeo jeoui baeg seongdeul-i jeoleul geoyeoghanaida
jeowa geudeul saileul pangyeolhayeojusigo jeowa deobul-eo midneun jadeul-eul guhayeo jusoseo
hananim-eun geuwa hamkke jim-eul gadeugsil-eun baee tan jadeul-eul guhayeoss nola
geuleon hu hananim-eun dwie nam eun jadeul-eul igsake haess-euni
sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss eoss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hayeossdeola
